This page is so obsolete, even its [Scratch Pads[superdocnolinks]|replacement] is obsolete. [Drafts[superdoc]] is the place to go now.

This is where you view (read-only) the Scratch Pad of another person. You of course can view and edit your own Scratch Pads at [Scratch Pads]. Questions about this feature are answered at [E2 Options: Sharing your scratch pad].

[% use Everything::Experience; return 'Log in first, please.' if getId($USER) == $HTMLVARS{guest_user}; my $UID = getId($USER); my $str = '
